DOC.brief_title: The Influence Trust Health Care System Postpartum Contraceptive Choice
DOC.detailed_description: The aim propose research three-fold : 1 . To identify whether trust health care system associate choice high efficacy contraception ( intrauterine contraception , implantable contraception , sterilization ) immediate postpartum period among pregnant woman receive prenatal care . 2 . To explore patient-level factor ( sociodemographic , reproductive history , future pregnancy intention ) provider-level factor ( antenatal contraceptive counseling ) associate choice high efficacy contraception immediate postpartum period among pregnant woman receive prenatal care . 3 . To determine whether trust health care system alter receipt prenatal care delivery .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant Women receive prenatal care Medical University South Carolina ( MUSC ) Age 18 old Greater 20 week gestation
